attributes.action: instigate a global response to the totally unacceptable ransom on Oil prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned order the Prime Minister to instigate a global response and positive reaction and to demand a fair and equal price structure for the supply of sweet -light- oil which currently stands - today - at $140 per barrel.
It is wholly and totally unacceptable that oil companies can subject the world economies to ransom and demand a higher than logical return for a Global product. A Global reaction is needed and a recognised leader must present it.
The Global economies and Leaders MUST become united to reverse the -what has now become a  naturally unquestioned- upwardly price trend.
